betterquesting.name: Building Supplies
betterquesting.desc:
Welcome, the day is ahead of you, but please work quickly. 

You'll need someplace to stay during the night. Grab some materials and we'll try to race the sun.

betterquesting.name: Sweet Dreams
betterquesting.desc: The best way to get through the night is by trying to forget it. Try to get some sleep. You'll need your energy tomorrow.

betterquesting.name: Save your things
betterquesting.desc: Make a spot to store stuff

betterquesting.name: Build it!
betterquesting.desc: You'll need a surface to make more interesting things.

betterquesting.name: Bone Cracker
betterquesting.desc: Killing skeletons

betterquesting.name: Re-killing
betterquesting.desc: A world without zombies is a better world.

betterquesting.name: Spidey senses
betterquesting.desc: Smash them all

betterquesting.name: Bone Cracker
betterquesting.desc: Killing skeletons

betterquesting.name: Re-killing
betterquesting.desc: A world without zombies is a better world.

betterquesting.name: Spidey senses
betterquesting.desc: Smash them all

betterquesting.name: A lever to move the world.
betterquesting.desc: Without tools, you will die. Here is a start. It's dangerous out there. Use them and return. I will show you more ways to use the world to give you better tools.

betterquesting.name: Tinkering
betterquesting.desc: The tools must be created from their parts. It's not like you can just put some wood and sticks on a table to get a tool...

betterquesting.name: YOU BROKE IT?!
betterquesting.desc:
Fixing tools is pretty easy, you can put a few blocks needed to repair it in the tool station with the tool. OR, you create a sharpening stone from the base material for your tool (wooden pickaxe needs a wood sharpening kit) and repair tools on the go. The kits even stack! 

Here, I'll give you a basic kit to test out.

You can also use these kits to upgrade your tools a bit too...

betterquesting.name: Fuel
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Metal time
betterquesting.desc: To get better materials, you need to step up  your game. Let's create a smeltery to get you started on basic metals and alloys. Cook your grout and we'll move on to making this structure.

betterquesting.name: Fight!
betterquesting.desc: The world isn't going to leave you alone. It's time to go out and take control. You need better weapons... learn to craft them now!

betterquesting.name: New Tools
betterquesting.desc:
Why carry two tools when you can have 1 that does 2 or more jobs?

Check out the mattock in the tool station to make a handy efficient tool! You can repair it with either tool head material as well.

betterquesting.name: Casting
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Alloys
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Re-usable casts!
betterquesting.desc: This material you found is so good, I think we can use it to make a parts cast that will last forever.

betterquesting.name: Home Sweet Home
betterquesting.desc:
A roof, some walls to keep it up, and a door to be safe. You can now build a home, or at the very least, a place to store your weapons.

Floor:
CCC
CCC
CCC

Walls:
PPP
P  P
P  P

PPP
P  P
P  P

  P

  P

Roof:
S  S
S  S
S  S

  T
  T
  T

betterquesting.name: Bricks and blocks
betterquesting.desc: Stick those bricks together to get blocks and parts. We're almost there!

betterquesting.name: Logs to Lumber
betterquesting.desc: Get that into a usable state.

betterquesting.name: Even smaller
betterquesting.desc: Yes, you have boards, but you COULD have little sticks.

betterquesting.name: Get a canary
betterquesting.desc: You've broken your first block of stone and the depths call to you. Get ready with some torches and a decent pickaxe. You'll need to find ore to get your mine on.

betterquesting.name: Cooking time
betterquesting.desc: Yes, you could use this to make food, charcoal, leather... but right now, let's heat up rocks!

betterquesting.name: ORE!
betterquesting.desc: There seems to be something useful in this stone. Maybe you can cook it out!

betterquesting.name: ORE!
betterquesting.desc: There seems to be something useful in this stone. Maybe you can cook it out!

betterquesting.name: ORE!
betterquesting.desc: There seems to be something useful in this stone. Maybe you can cook it out!

betterquesting.name: Building
betterquesting.desc: There's no place like home.
